data.title: Norway
data.meta_description: In the year 2007 The Norwegian Olympic and Paralympic Committee and Confederation of Sports (NIF) finally decided that Norway should have an inclusive model for disability sport (now termed para sport) in their main sport organisation. This meant dissolving all the...
